entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: E 39 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to drizzle and ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
